WRITING.TEXT: This is what I hate so much. The "all things wrong with white males" articles and just the society norm of making fun of guys penis sizes or height. And even when they brag about rejecting guys. Most of the time its girls that do that and they have 0 context for it from a guys point of view and would flip their shit if a guy made fun of even their weight(which is something they can actually change). This modern society has taught people to hate on white males and love every minority/female.

I would say a big part of it is that our modern society teaches/expects males to suppress their negative/sad feelings. Guys are told to "be strong" and not cry or talk to people about emotions. Its something I'd love to see change. I see girl crying in public and three dudes run over to her asking what's wrong and asking if she's okay, they have someone there to help them. A guy does the same thing and he gets weird looks and uncomfortable responses.Most of the time guys are expected to be rocks emotionally and this leads to guys letting the sadness/negativity overtake them and have no outlet for it all other than suicide.
I considered it but implying that this is some sort of cover up just because of her race/political stance is still a bit of a reach considering the information we have been given.

They're fairly common actually. Hundreds of people commit suicide every day and their bodies end up everywhere. You normally just don't hear about it because its usually some middle class white male. There's no implication in that though so nobody is going to care.
Source: https://afsp.org/about-suicide/suicide-statistics/
White males accounted for 7 of 10 suicides in 2015.
Unless you can prove that there is some kind of big cover up behind this, we can only go by what they tell us.
Rich, white, young people kill themselves all the time. You dont know what goes through other peoples minds.

this is the second black judge killed in a matter of days, both under highly suspicious circumstances.
highly suspicious? she was found dead in a river with no signs of foul play. That just sounds like suicide to me.

But someone on one of the top comments is using it to support the notion that she was murdered by cutting out the part of the article where they say the police saw no signs of criminality and only talking about how great of a person she was and how she was african-american/muslim. So only bits and pieces of it are legitimate? or It's only legit when its used to push one side of the story?

of course this was left out of the quote above you but this part of the NYT article seems to imply that there was no foul play at all.
The police were investigating how she ended up in the river, and it was not clear how long Judge Abdus-Salaam, who lived nearby in Harlem, had been missing. There were no signs of trauma on her body, the police said. She was fully clothed.
A law enforcement official said investigators had found no signs of criminality. Her husband identified her body.

And a lot of the time they arent wrong. Also a body in a river is a much more common occurrence than somebody shooting up/blowing up a building. The fact that this is being instantly equated to a hate crime because of her race is unsettling. Even the title of this post shoots for dividing the community by adding labels before we even know anything about what happened to her.

I was wondering if someone would be reasonable enough to say this. This title alone makes it sound like this was a racially charged murder when in reality we know nothing about how she even died. Her race is completely irrelevant unless its proved that it was racially motivated. Kind of disgusting that so many people on here are assuming this was a racially charged murder.

WRITING.TITLE: Anybody else hope that the new music doesn't come in an EP?
WRITING.TEXT: I just don't like the whole EP train that tom is riding right now. To me EP's always feel like an incomplete thought. If you're going to go through all the effort of recording and hiring a sound engineer to mix everything than why not just record 5-6 more songs to complete the story.
I guess what I meant was a band that has the same percussive element too and does it consistently. MAGIC! was the closest band I found but they flopped on their latest album.

That's exactly what I was thinking. The Police is one of my favorite bands and no other modern band has been able to even begin to replicate the same sound. I was so excited when I started reading that they made a song with so much Police influence and then had my heart broken when they said they scrapped it three words later.
"Let's dismiss one issue by talking about how someone else does the same thing!"
I thought this entire article was going to be praising Diop for some reason and then I realized how bad Diop was that game. He kept coming out of his box and losing the ball instantly.

You have any proof of that? I know he's a bit arrogant but he never came across as a complete dick to me. I've seen hours of video where he talks to people like normal and jokes around. Also he might've meant that as a joke and maybe you took it the wrong way like maybe he meant it like "oh yea well with how this industry is now you either sing and make it big or you drum and make just enough money to get by" and you took it as him just saying you can't make it in the music industry.

Is there a modern bands that copy this sound? I cant seem to find anybody who is trying this type of music and doing it well. The closest I have been able to find was the band "MAGIC!" but after their first album they flopped. Their new album just tries to blatantly copy the police but with a lot more pop sounds and a lot worse song writing.

That is true but Stewart Copeland was the driving force and sound of the band. Listen to some Klark Kent stuff(stewarts solo stuff pre-police). it sounds almost exactly like the police just with stewart singing. Stewart formed the band, created the sound. Summers and sting just played their parts.

It's a joke dude. Its making fun of their lack of communication/progress. Any Dev company that doesn't communicate to their fans at all deserves to be made fun of IMO. I paid $20 for this disaster and I have 0 idea if they'll even be fixing it in the next year.

The exact same thing happened here. https://www.reddit.com/r/conspiracy/comments/61r92s/if_trump_doesnt_veto_the_bill_that_allows_our_isp/dfh0c07/?context=10000 This dude is being labeled a trump supporter for just mentioning him. But because he mentioned trump in his post he was instantly labeled a trump supporter and attacked for it. Its almost like I was reading something different from what they were. well see you're accusing someone of having a bias but in reality you're the one with a bias.

So far he hasn't. He has been working on a big project with all the government leaders in which they all talk about their experiences and what they know in a video. There was a trailer for it in the wikileaks dump. Im not sure if someone still has it or not.

"If the president doesn't do what he is supposed to do and look out for the general population then we need to do something about it". He's not saying "well king trump here will most likely veto this bill but if he doesn't we have to talk to our senators." WRITING.TITLE: "Too much to think" Discussion Thread
WRITING.TEXT:
It seems like everyone's opinion is pretty split over this song. Decided to open a thread to see the general vibe from the entire subreddit after a day of listening to the song.
For the uninitiated - "Too much to think" https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VdZ2lHqaDyI

Unfortunately that seems true. I dig it a lot. I think its something modern and different while still keeping the signature 311 sound. This is a song that I could see doing really well on radio stations this summer.

I agree. Theyve taken away pretty much all the main features and gamemodes from the game. There was an entire story mode that they got rid of. It was like a full fledged game that just needed multiplayer. Now its a completely empty game and most of the online maps are boring versions of the old maps. They still dont even have all the maps ported and its been almost 10 months. They havnt put most of the stuff back in and I have yet to hear anything about the soccer gamemode that they showcased at E3. At this point im convinced they just took our money and ran. They need to hand this off to new devs. These current devs have no sort of timeline or respect to their own set release dates. They were supposed to have a complete game by the end of 2016(their own word) and now almost three months in to the next year and we havnt heard anything. What a fucking disaster.
As far as I've seen they've not said anything about the actual release date. It was originally last year but now its just "whenever its done"
